attributes.action: Abolish the petition: Repeal the hunting act 2004
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a very urgent petition to stop the people who want to get rid of the hunting act 2004.
Hunting is a cruel sport and we need to stop the petition.So you know how urgent this is the petition has over 3900 signatures and it will end soon
we need to abolish this petition to help them foxes out there who are scared out of the skin (literally)
when they realise there lives are going to end.

PLEASE HELP
FOXES ARE COINTING ON US TO DO SOMETHING TODAY!!
This petition is only open for 2 months

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
